channel.title: Can someone help me port forward?
channel.description: Ok I have asked tons of people what i've been doing wrong because noone can connect to my server... I was asking if someone could check my portforwarding to see if it was done correctly and if not fix it. I have teamviewer and i am using Hell-pkz client and server.... all the client says is ""error connecting to server" and the server console says there was no connection attempt... plz help!

item.title: Can someone help me port forward?
item.dc:creator: @Valcorex Valcorex
item.description:
@Valcorex wrote:

Ok I have asked tons of people what i’ve been doing wrong because noone can connect to my server… I was asking if someone could check my portforwarding to see if it was done correctly and if not fix it. I have teamviewer and i am using Hell-pkz client and server… all the client says is "“error connecting to server” and the server console says there was no connection attempt… plz help!
